top_categories.workout_context: 90ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
Dirty French's appalachian foothills gravel - steep sustained forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 100 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Dirty French's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before May.
At Dirty French, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
At mile 60 of 100, glycogen is gone. This workout teaches your body to produce watts on fumes.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Dirty French. Train it until it feels boring.
9,000ft of climbing on grades that change every minute. You need to switch from seated to standing without losing rhythm.
9,000ft of climbing means repeated surges above threshold. VO2max work is how you survive the fifth climb, not just the first.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Dirty French, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
Endurance with intensity spikes baked in. Exactly what 9,000ft of climbing on appalachian foothills gravel - steep sustained does to your power file on race day.
Low-cadence force work for 9,000ft of climbing. The slow, grinding ascents where you can't spin—you push.
Short, max efforts are unavoidable. Punchy climbs, gap closures, attacks on appalachian foothills gravel - steep sustained. If you haven't trained them, you'll crack.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for Dirty French’s 100 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Dirty French requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on appalachian foothills gravel - steep sustained climbs, technical terrain, challenging ohio hill country to build confidence.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 100 miles of appalachian foothills gravel - steep sustained climbs, technical terrain, challenging ohio hill country in Chillicothe, Ohio.
